item.description: System data Domain name: LEGACY Windows versions: Windows 5.1 It seems to be vulnerable to ms08-067 Using msfconsole is super easy to exploit the system and get both the user and root flag at the same time. I’m going to try to exploit it manually. Flow process title: Port scanning collapse: closed ```ad-question title: `nmap --open -T5 -p- -vvv 10.10.10.4 -n -Pn -oG nmap/allports` collapse: closed ~~~python PORT STATE SERVICE REASON 139/tcp open netbios-ssn syn-ack 445/tcp open microsoft-ds syn-ack ``` ```ad-question title: `nmap -sCV -pC^V 10.
